about_the_game:
LIVING CITY

Dynamic Living City: Explore the sprawling, hand-crafted environments of Z-36, where every corner hides secrets, dangers, and opportunities. Each session is an opportunity to explore the huge cityscape with different paths, challenges, and opportunities for those brave enough to scout its depths.

Parkour Mastery: Utilize advanced movement mechanics to scale buildings, dart through alleys, and traverse rooftops. Every route could be your salvation or your demise.

Hand-Placed Details: Navigate through meticulously designed environments that add realism and unpredictability to every playthrough.

FIGHT or HIDE

  • Stealth or Combat? Your Choice: Engage in intense PvE and PvP encounters. Sneak past Grimz and rival players or face them head-on with customized weaponry. How you fight determines your fate.

  • Lurking Enemies: Battle the Grimz—mutant undead that stalk every corner of Z-36. Are they around the corner?  Prepare for the unexpected, develop new tactics, and become deadlier over time.

  • Weapon Customization: Scavenge and upgrade a wide array of weapons, each offering unique advantages and trade-offs. Adapt your style to stay ahead of the city's nightmares.

EXTRACT or RISK IT ALL

  • High-Stakes Extraction: Gather valuable loot and navigate perilous extraction points, risking betrayal and surprise attacks from both enemies and other players. 

  • The Luring Power of the Gleam: The longer you expose yourself to the Gleam, the greater the risk that your body succumbs to its decaying touch. Yet with that risk comes the allure of even greater rewards scattered around the map.

  • Helicopter Extractions: Outsmart your foes and escape via extraction points, securing your loot and advancing your progress.

ADAPT

  • Mutate to Dominate: Survive long enough, and you may unlock powerful mutations that make you the ultimate hunter. These abilities shift the balance, turning you from prey to predator.

  • Adapt to Changing Dangers: The persistent city evolves with each session, presenting new hazards and altering familiar routes. Constant adaptation is your greatest weapon.

  • Nightmarish Denizens: Face relentless, nightmarish creatures lurking in the shadows. Employ different strategies to confront or evade them and make it out alive.

CUSTOMIZE & SURVIVE THE SHOW

  • Climb the Ranks: Extract valuable loot, survive consecutive sessions, and rise on the leaderboard. Each successful extraction strengthens your character and unlocks exclusive perks.

  • Stunning Customization: Access thousands of skins, emotes, and equipment pieces to personalize your character. Show off your hard-earned status in style.

  • Trade & Upgrade: Sell rare items and artifacts for gear upgrades and powerful perks that enhance your survivability and combat prowess.

content_descriptors.notes:
Last Remains is a mature zombie apocalypse survival game that contains frequent depictions of intense violence, blood, and gore. Players will encounter graphic scenes of combat, where characters use a variety of weapons to defeat both human enemies and undead zombies in a post-apocalyptic world. This includes dismemberment, and other violent interactions as part of the core gameplay.

Additionally, the game’s dark setting may include themes of death, survival under extreme conditions, and morally ambiguous choices.

While Last Remains does not depict any sexual acts, it does involve strong language and content that some players may find distressing, including:

Graphic violence and gore in combat and character deaths.

Themes related to self-preservation and survival under duress.

We encourage players who may be sensitive to these themes or have concerns regarding intense violence to review this content before playing.

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: "Last Remains" is a highly challenging multiplayer zombie survival game. Players must survive in a city overrun by the undead, scavenging for food, arming themselves, avoiding zombies, searching for loot, plundering other survivors, and finding any possible way to escape.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
